item.title: Late-Night Short Note: Mother Tongue
item.description: Last weekend, I was on a team with some students from my school for an online math competition. One of the students on the team (let’s call her Student-A) who was from another grade had a Chinese name, so I assumed that she was Chinese or ethnically Chinese. When we met at school, I was “relieved” to come up and suggest, “Let’s talk in Chinese!” But of course it didn’t go well in the reality.
